welcome_message_body: Welcome to Isparta, Turkey! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's picturesque rose gardens, historic architecture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Isparta has to offer.

restaurants.name: Mint Homemade
restaurants.description: Mint Homemade is a café located in Isparta.

restaurants.name: Çorbada Şayan
restaurants.description: Çorbada Şayan is a soup spot located in Isparta.
restaurants.address: Kutlubey Mah. Kafeler Cad. (Mimar Sinan), 32100 Isparta

restaurants.name: Ferah Kebap Salonu
restaurants.description: Ferah Kebap Salonu is a kebab restaurant located in Isparta.
restaurants.address: Kutlubey Mah. 120. Cad. Atatürk Parkı İçi No:13, 32100 Isparta

restaurants.name: Çay Sarayı
restaurants.description: Çay Sarayı is a café located in Çelebiler.

restaurants.name: Gramofon Cafe & Bistro
restaurants.description: Gramofon Cafe & Bistro is a café located in Isparta.
restaurants.address: Kepeci Mahallesi 1218 Sokak No:2/1 (İstasyon Caddesi), 32100 Isparta

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Isparta Airport serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
